page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: The roads in Tredegar need repairing because they are full of pot holes. people have had accidents because the roads are dangerous. The worst roads are the main roads leading into and out of Tredegar. Some of the side roads need attention as well. We have two main bus services in Tredegar, one is the pubic service known as the "Red and White" and the other is the private service "Hills". It is a service that is well-known. It is the bus service we use to go swimming and to go on trips. There are two major car garages in Tredegar, Ford and Vauxhall. The most popular cars in Tredegar are Ford and Vauxhall. The most popular car colours are blue and red.
